main_features.description: Automatically scrapes the index of EU funding opportunities, extracts links to PDFs, validates URLs and pagination.
Manages a PostgreSQL database with tables for convocations, tasks, and related data.
Provides RESTful API endpoints to retrieve and manage convocation data.
Displays a web dashboard with real-time system status, scraping statistics, and task results.

corrective_actions.description: Ensure the `uuid` module is imported in the `app/models.py` file where it's used.
corrective_actions.solution: Add `from uuid import uuid4` at the top of the `app/models.py` file.
